about_the_game:
Get ready for a heart-stopping adventure in the Midnight Pufferfish Show, the multiplayer game that brings the excitement of high-stakes competition to your screen! Outwit, outmaneuver, and outlast your opponents in a cutthroat contest where every decision could be your last. Do you have what it takes to rise above the competition and win the Midnight Pufferfish Show?

With its engaging multiplayer experience, the Midnight Pufferfish Show lets you play against up to 24 players, making each game a thrilling experience that's both fun and challenging. But that's not all! This game also features more than 15 diverse characters, each with their own story and unique motives for playing the game. From "Dodgeball" to "Catch the Fish," and "The Challenge of the Glass Bridge" to "Jokenpô," the "Midnight Pufferfish Show" lets you experience a range of childhood games in a way that you never have before. But beware, one wrong move and it could all be over! The stakes are high, and the consequences of losing are fatal to your character.

If you're looking for an exciting and unique gaming experience, then the "Midnight Pufferfish Show" is the game for you. With its engaging multiplayer feature, diverse cast of characters, and deadly games, this game promises to keep you on the edge of your seat. So why wait? Download the game today and see if you have what it takes to come out on top in the "Midnight Pufferfish Show."

Features:

Multiplayer Experience

Play against up to 24 players in a thrilling and challenging multiplayer experience.

Diverse Cast of Characters
Choose from over 15+ unique characters, each with their own story and motives for participating in the game.

Childhood Games with a Twist

Experience childhood games like "Dodgeball," "Catch the Fish," and "The Challenge of the Glass Bridge" in a whole new way, with high stakes and fatal consequences for losing.

Competitive

On the "Midnight Pufferfish Show" only one wins -- A bit of luck may help, but better you count on your skills.

Lore


The “Midnight Pufferfish Show” is a mysterious and thrilling experience that can only be watched at midnight. In fact, the TV channel that hosts the game is fuzzy and offline during the entire daytime, except when it's streaming the show. This adds an extra layer of intrigue and excitement, as viewers wait in anticipation for the clock to strike midnight so they can tune in and watch the deadly games.

In addition to its bizarre streaming schedule, the "Midnight Pufferfish Show" also features a hilarious and entertaining narrator known as Big Fausto. With his funny and witty comments, Big Fausto engages viewers and keeps them entertained throughout the entire show. As participants play through each deadly game, Big Fausto will be there to provide engaging commentary and keep you laughing. His humor adds an extra layer of entertainment to the show, making it an experience that's both thrilling and fun for the public.

The "Midnight Pufferfish Show" is not your average game show - it's a mysterious and eerie experience that has left viewers and participants puzzled for over 20 years. One of the most unusual and unsettling aspects of the show is that everyone who dies during the game mysteriously appears alive the next day, as if nothing had happened. However, there's a catch - some of these people seem different, slow, disconnected from reality, or even zombified for your acquaintances. Despite widespread theories and urban horror stories about the strange occurrences on the show, nothing has been proved in the two decades of its existence. No one knows where the game is being recorded, when the recordings happen, or even who is behind the show. This adds an extra layer of mystery and intrigue to the game, as players and viewers are left to speculate and wonder about what's really going on.

Download it Now!
